name: LTW: Little Train World
description:
All aboard !

LTW: Little Train World is a sandbox game where you can create your own world, with unique railway and train.

Controls :

  • ZQSD to move the camera
  • A and E to rotate the camera
  • Mouse Roll to move up and down the camera
  • Left click to create blocks and right click to destroy
  • Tab to switch between the creation panels
  • Space to switch between Pause and Play mode
  • F12 to take screenshots
  • Escape to qui the game

WARNING : the game is in a very early version. Current build is Prototype Build. So expect a LOT of bugs
